dict.acceptation: 破坏，毁灭，消灭，灭亡，扑灭，驱除；摧毁；毁灭的原因，破坏手段；杀害；

sent.orig: Cataclysm (Destruction) -Now also increases your chance to hit with Destruction spells by 1% per point.
sent.trans: 灾变（毁灭）-现在每点也增加毁灭法术命中1%。

sent.orig: He was an angry youth, with destruction and domination already on his mind.
sent.trans: 他曾是一个愤怒的青年，内心已经充满破坏欲和支配欲。

sent.orig: Al Qaeda offers the people of Pakistan nothing but destruction. We stand for something different.
sent.trans: 基地组织向巴基斯坦人民提供的唯有破坏，而我们则不同。

sent.orig: The destruction of the rest of the complex was proceeding as rapidly as this café.
sent.trans: 生活区的其它部分的毁灭象这个餐馆一样迅速。

sent.orig: At some point, parents inured to a child's self-destruction, but I never did.
sent.trans: 从某种程度上，父母对孩子的自我毁灭习以为常，那我从来没有。
